about_the_game:
"X-Angel Artbook" includes character illustrations, scenes, illustrations, and early character designs not featured in the game. Relive every thrilling battle with us!

The artbook consists of 55 pages, including:

Full character illustrations with facial expressions
Various unused early content
Background designs
Comic and story scene retrospectives
Some drawing processes and sketches

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains depictions of graphic sex, in pixel art form. Player is able to in the game are capable of non consensual sex with the female depends how player's behaviour.

Themes in this game include:
・ Risque outfits, sexual comments and lewd situations
・All characters portrayed in this game are over the age of 20.
・ Strong language, alcohol and drug use (fantasy products)
・ Fantasy sexual situations with exaggerated characters
・This game contains sexual content with consensual & non-consensual sex.
・This game depicts both physical and mental/emotional violence.
・This game adult including full nudity, sexual scenes, anal sex.
